title: Idea for a Name of a Franchise for a Team
body:
We are looking for a good franchise name to go by and I would appreciate if the LoL community would pitch in their ideas of what a good name might be. 
To all those that post anything thank you and please support my friend. Please be original and if the name is awesome i might give you an reward  :D

replies.body:
Magnum Collection.
Imperium eSports
Infernal Machine
Kogs of War
